SELECT * FROM ( SELECT no, title, event_date, type, holiday_yn, repeat_yn, delete_yn, reg_date FROM tb_event WHERE 0=0 AND event_date like CONCAT('%', #{eventDate},'%') AND tb_event.repeat_yn = 'N' UNION
SELECT no, title, event_date, type, holiday_yn, repeat_yn, delete_yn, reg_date FROM tb_event WHERE 0=0 AND event_date like CONCAT('%-', #{month},'-%') AND tb_event.repeat_yn = 'Y' ) AS event_list ORDER BY DAY(event_date);
